p: The success of oral delivery of NVCP VLPs encouraged the exploration of their delivery through alternative mucosal routes. A study by Guerrero and colleagues demonstrated that intranasal (IN) delivery was more effective than oral delivery at provoking NVCP-specific serum IgG and intestinal IgA responses by low doses of VLPs [ 114]. For example, IN delivery of two 10 μg doses of insect cell-derived NVCP VLPs in the presence of a mucosal adjuvant (mutant E. coli heat-liable toxin LTR192G) elicited anti-NVCP titers equivalent to that of two dosages of 200 μg orally delivered adjuvanted VLPs [ 114].
